Method Detail

createFieldsQuery

public static String createFieldsQuery(uk.ac.ebi.ep.config.Domain domain,
                                       uk.ac.ebi.ep.search.model.SearchParams searchParams)
Create a Lucene query for a list of fields of which value is from the searchParam. The query consists of several search fields configured in the Config.xml file. Each field is separated by an OR statement. The keyword in the SearchParams is the value to be queried in each field. Eg.: id:"Sildenafil" OR name:"Sildenafil".

Parameters:
domain - The Domain object that contains the search fields which are used to create the fields query.
searchParams - The SearchParam object which contain the keywords and the filter which are used to ass
Returns:
a Lucene query

createFieldsQueryWithEnzymeFilter

public static String createFieldsQueryWithEnzymeFilter(uk.ac.ebi.ep.config.Domain domain,
                                                       uk.ac.ebi.ep.search.model.SearchParams searchParams)
Similar to the createFieldsQuery(uk.ac.ebi.ep.config.Domain, uk.ac.ebi.ep.search.model.SearchParams) except this method adds the enzyme filter String to query enzyme only in Uniprot domain. This query can only be used to query data from Uniprot domain, because other domains do not have the ec field.

Parameters:
domain -
searchParams -
Returns:
See Also:
#createFieldsQuery(uk.ac.ebi.ep.config.Domain, uk.ac.ebi.ep.search.model.SearchParams)}

createFieldsQuery

public static String createFieldsQuery(List<String> fieldNames,
                                       String fieldValue)
Overloaded method to create a Lucene query from the fieldNames and fieldValue instead of a Domain object and a SearchParam object.

Parameters:
fieldNames - The search field names
fieldValue - The value of the field names to query
Returns:
a Lucene query OR

createUniprotAPIQueryByIdPrefixes

public static List<String> createUniprotAPIQueryByIdPrefixes(List<String> idPrefixes,
                                                             Collection<String> speciesFilter)
Create a list of query by id. A query is created for each id. Queries created by the method can only be used for Uniprot API.

Parameters:
idPrefixes -
speciesFilter -
Returns:

createQueriesIn

public static List<String> createQueriesIn(String queryField,
                                           List<String> fieldValues,
                                           boolean wildcard,
                                           int subListSize)
Create a list of Lucene queries IN (eg.: id:("PDE7B_HUMAN","PDE7B_MOUSE")) for a long list of field values. If the list is too long then it is divided into sub lists. A query is created for each sub list. Every query includes an "enzyme filter".

Parameters:
queryField -
fieldValues -
wildcard -
subListSize -
Returns:
Throws:
EnzymeFinderException

createEbeyeQueriesIn

public static List<String> createEbeyeQueriesIn(String queryField,
                                                List<String> fieldValues,
                                                boolean wildcard,
                                                int subListSize)
Builds queries for the given field and field values, adding an enzyme filter.

Parameters:
queryField - field to query
fieldValues - values to match
wildcard - use a wildcard?
subListSize - size of sublist to divide the original list of field values, if it is too long.
Returns:
